samples.name: qrb ros imu
run_commands: export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 run qrb_ros_imu imu_node
export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 topic echo /imu

samples.name: qrb ros battery
run_commands: export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 run $package_name battery_node
export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 topic echo /battery_stats

samples.name: qrb ros camera
run_commands: export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 launch qrb_ros_camera qrb_ros_camera_launch.py

samples.name: qrb ros system monitor
run_commands: export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 run qrb_ros_system_monitor qrb_ros_system_monitor
export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 topic echo /memory

samples.name: ocr service
run_commands: export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 run ocr_service ocr_client test
export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 run ocr_service ocr_testnode --topic test --picture /usr/digital_720p.png
export HOME=/home && source /usr/bin/ros_setup.sh && source /usr/share/qirp-setup.sh && ros2 run ocr_service ocr_server
